import { Component } from "react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Card, Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { Props, UserData as State } from "../../../interface/Interfaces" import { mapDispatchToProps, mapStateToProps } from "../../../app/functions" import SearchFamily from './SearchFamily' class Result extends Component { editData = () => { this.props.setToResult(false) } member = (): JSX.Element => { return ( <> No NIK Nama Status Keluarga 1 1234567890123456 MUHAIMIN ANAK ) } render = () => { const { kk_data, toResult } = this.props.temporer // console.log(kk_data) return toResult === false ? <> Info! Pastikan data sudah benar dan hasil akan ditampilkan di sini : <>

Data KK


No. KK : { kk_data!.no_kk }
Kepala Keluarga : { kk_data!.family_head }
RT/RW : { kk_data!.rt }/{ kk_data!.rw }
Kelurahan/Desa : { kk_data!.village }
Kecamatan : { kk_data!.districts }
Kabupaten/Kota : { kk_data!.city }
Kode Pos : { kk_data!.zip }
Provinsi : { kk_data!.province }

Anggota Keluarga

{ this.member() }


} } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Result))
